1.text: A cloaked stranger begs shelter. Let him in (A) or refuse (B)? :

2.text: He drips water on your map room. Offer dry clothes (A) or ignore (B)? :

3.text: You slam the door; lightning hits a nearby oak. Investigate (A) or stay inside (B)? :

4.text: In gratitude he reveals a broken compass. Inspect it (A) or set it aside (B)? :

5.text: He eyes your fireplace hungrily. Share soup (A) or send him to the guest room (B)? :

6.text: Under the oak you find a glowing sigil. Touch it (A) or mark it in a journal (B)? :

7.text: Staying inside, you hear hoofbeats. Peek through shutters (A) or bar the door (B)? :

8.text: The compass needle spins wildly. Shake it (A) or press the cracked glass (B)? :

9.text: You tuck the compass away. Later it buzzes. Retrieve it (A) or ignore (B)? :

10.text: The soup warms him up; he offers a silver key. Accept (A) or refuse gifts (B)? :

11.text: Guest room creaks; he mutters spells. Eavesdrop (A) or give privacy (B)? :

12.text: Touching sigil: you see a vision of a castle gate. Approach gate (A) or return home (B)? :

13.text: Marking it triggers a rumble; a tunnel opens. Enter (A) or report to town guard (B)? :

14.text: Through shutters: riders in armor flash badges. Signal them (A) or stay hidden (B)? :

15.text: You bar the door; a loud knock. Open (A) or pretend no one’s home (B)? :

16.text: Shaking compass: a gem dislodges. Keep gem (A) or hand to stranger (B)? :

17.text: Pressing glass shows a map of secret catacombs. Ask stranger to explain (A) or research alone (B)? :

18.text: Compass vibrates toward the cellar. Follow (A) or stay in lounge (B)? :

19.text: Ignoring buzz, lights flicker. Check fuse box (A) or light candles (B)? :

20.text: Accept key; he says “fits the Storm Tower.” Question him (A) or head to tower (B)? :

21.text: Refusing key, he keeps it but looks hurt. Apologize (A) or stay firm (B)? :

22.text: Eavesdropping: hear “guardian awakens.” Burst in (A) or keep listening (B)? :

23.text: You leave him; a lullaby drifts out. Fall asleep (A) or brew coffee (B)? :

24.text: At gate: gargoyles judge you. Present compass (A) or sigil mark (B)? :

25.text: Returning home: town crier accuses you of witchcraft. Defend yourself (A) or flee (B)? :

26.text: Tunnel leads to crystal bridge. Cross (A) or collect samples (B)? :

27.text: Guards scoff but follow you. Lead them in (A) or let them go first (B)? :

28.text: Signaling riders: they’re Inquisitors. Ask for help (A) or deny them entry (B)? :

29.text: Hidden, you overhear “artifact hunt.” Shadow them (A) or lock upstairs window (B)? :

30.text: You open door: royal messenger seeks refuge. Allow (A) or refuse (B)? :

31.text: Pretending empty, messenger leaves a sealed letter. Read (A) or burn (B)? :

32.text: Keeping gem; it glows with heat. Embed in ring (A) or store in safe (B)? :

33.text: Handing gem over, stranger says “You’re worthy.” Trust him (A) or demand answers (B)? :

34.text: Ask stranger: he names Eclipsed King. Swear loyalty (A) or refuse (B)? :

35.text: Research alone: dusty tome warns “key plus compass opens end.” Destroy compass (A) or keep exploring (B)? :

36.text: Cellar door unlocks itself. Descend (A) or fetch lantern (B)? :

37.text: Staying lounge; window shatters. Fight intruder (A) or hide (B)? :

38.text: At fuse box; wires sparking green. Cut main power (A) or try reset (B)? :

39.text: Candles reveal hidden runes on walls. Trace rune (A) or erase (B)? :

40.text: Question him: he admits he’s the tower’s keeper. Accept partnership (A) or arrest him (B)? :

41.text: Head to tower solo. Storm rages. Use key (A) or pick lock (B)? :

42.text: Apologize: he smiles and offers a potion. Drink (A) or politely decline (B)? :

43.text: Stay firm: he pockets key; a shadow passes window. Ask what was that (A) or close curtains (B)? :

44.text: Burst in: spell explodes. Dodge (A) or counterspell (B)? :

45.text: Keep listening: phrase “moon at zenith.” Wait till midnight (A) or intervene early (B)? :

46.text: Fall asleep: dream of crystal stag. Follow stag (A) or wake up (B)? :

47.text: Coffee keeps you awake; thunder knocks out power. Check roof (A) or seal shutters (B)? :

48.text: Compass impresses gargoyles; gate opens. Enter courtyard (A) or circle walls (B)? :

49.text: Sigil mark triggers lightning; gate blasts open. Rush in (A) or wait (B)? :

50.text: Defend in court; judge asks for proof. Show sigil (A) or call stranger witness (B)? :

51.text: Flee: marsh guards ambush you. Fight (A) or surrender (B)? :

52.text: Cross bridge; mid‑way it cracks. Run (A) or crawl carefully (B)? :

54.text: Lead guards inside; trapdoor shuts behind them. Leave (A) or search exit (B)? :

55.text: Let guards go first; you hear screams. Follow (A) or seal tunnel (B)? :

56.text: Ask inquisitors for help; they demand relic. Negotiate (A) or refuse (B)? :

57.text: Deny entry; they brand you traitor. Escape via roof (A) or fight (B)? :

58.text: Shadow riders; you see secret map. Steal it (A) or copy quickly (B)? :

59.text: Lock window; lightning hits hinge, revealing keyhole. Insert silver key (A) or ignore (B)? :

60.text: Allow messenger; he seeks safe passage. Guide him (A) or hide him (B)? :

61.text: Refuse; he curses you. Apologize (A) or slam door (B)? :

62.text: Read letter; decree of royal pardon. Use it (A) or stash (B)? :

63.text: Burn letter; smoke forms symbols. Inhale (A) or fan away (B)? :

64.text: Embed gem in ring; it fuses. Wear ring (A) or lock it away (B)? :

65.text: Store gem; safe turns warm. Open again (A) or leave it (B)? :

66.text: Trust him; he grants secret password. Note it (A) or memorize then burn note (B)? :

67.text: Demand answers; he turns hostile. Calm him (A) or draw weapon (B)? :

68.text: Swear loyalty; you gain shadow cloak. Wear (A) or keep folded (B)? :

69.text: Refuse; he vanishes leaving dust. Collect dust (A) or vacuum it (B)? :

70.text: Destroy compass; shards spin, portal opens. Enter portal (A) or seal it (B)? :

71.text: Keep exploring; compass leads to old observatory. Climb dome (A) or search basement (B)? :

72.text: Descend cellar; meet crystal‑eyed rat. Feed it (A) or chase it (B)? :

73.text: Fetch lantern; cellar stairs collapse. Jump (A) or retreat (B)? :

74.text: Fight scene—win but injured. Bandage (A) or press on (B)? :

75.text: Hiding; discover secret panel. Open (A) or ignore (B)? :

76.text: Power cut; ghosts appear. Speak to them (A) or run (B)? :

77.text: Reset sparks; you’re electrocuted. Cry for help (A) or stand up (B)? :

78.text: Trace rune; walls shift revealing library. Enter (A) or take book and leave (B)? :

79.text: Erase rune; ceiling drips acid. Use umbrella (A) or dash out (B)? :

80.text: Partnership forged; you reach relic chamber. Use key (A) or offer cloak (B)? :

81.text: Arrest attempt fails; he escapes with relic. Chase (A) or call guards (B)? :

82.text: Key turns; tower hums. Step inside (A) or wait (B)? :

83.text: Picking lock triggers dart trap. Duck (A) or shield with cloak (B)? :

84.text: Drink potion; you gain night‑vision. Explore attic (A) or go outside (B)? :

85.text: Decline; he sips it and laughs. Ask why (A) or grab vial (B)? :

86.text: Ask about shadow; he warns of Wraith. Set wards (A) or ignore (B)? :

87.text: Close curtains; shadow enters anyway. Confront (A) or escape (B)? :

88.text: Dodge/counter‑spell success; portal opens. Leap (A) or destroy portal (B)? :

89.text: Fail spell; explosion. Drag stranger out (A) or save yourself (B)? :

90.text: Negotiation succeeds; inquisitors ally. Lead raid (A) or double‑cross (B)? :

91.text: Refusal enrages them; siege begins. Hold fort (A) or sneak out (B)? :

92.text: Roof escape; storm lightning helps you fly (!) Aim for tower (A) or open sky (B)? :

93.text: Wake up; dream stag stands in room. Touch antlers (A) or bow (B)? :

94.text: Steal map; gain route to relic. Follow at dawn (A) or immediately (B)? :

95.text: Copy map; ink glows. Speak words aloud (A) or wash hands (B)? :

96.text: Courtyard full of statues. Inspect center statue (A) or follow wall shadows (B)? :

97.text: Circling walls; hidden door. Enter (A) or mark for later (B)? :

98.text: Rush in / use decree / etc.—trap room. Solve puzzle (A) or brute force (B)? :

99.text: Waiting / stash / bow—time rift appears. Enter (A) or close eyes (B)? :

100.text: Final guardian asks riddle. Answer truthfully (A) or lie (B)? :
